id: The percentage of the purchase price advanced as the loan.
name: The percentage of the purchase price advanced as the loan.

id: This ontology defines concepts specific to marine finance, which involves financing vessel acquisitions for the spot market, time charters or bareboat charters, as well as the construction of work boats, and to finance the acquisition of vessels for scrapping.
name: This ontology defines concepts specific to marine finance, which involves financing vessel acquisitions for the spot market, time charters or bareboat charters, as well as the construction of work boats, and to finance the acquisition of vessels for scrapping.

id: Whether the vessel is to be held in ownership as a form of chattel by the lender during the period of the loan.
name: Whether the vessel is to be held in ownership as a form of chattel by the lender during the period of the loan.

id: Textual description (name etc.) of where the vessel is to be moored if it has a permanent mooring place.
name: Textual description (name etc.) of where the vessel is to be moored if it has a permanent mooring place.

id: Whether the boat is intended to be used and is legally able to be used as a place of residence.
name: Whether the boat is intended to be used and is legally able to be used as a place of residence.

id: A loan for the purchase of a boat or other vessel.
name: A loan for the purchase of a boat or other vessel.
